pros: Crafters' choice for holding up supplies such as die cutters
cons: Though the adhesive bonds well to surfaces, the magnetic side isn’t as strong as some would like

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Magnet
customer_reviews.text: This magnet sticks to NOTHING. I added a video review so you can see how this sticks to a refrigerator only with some help and very carefully. And that is by itself with absolutely nothing attached to it yet. I doubt this would hold anything heavier than a very light photo. Too bad it isn't usable because there was a lot of it. If what you need it for is very lightweight photos for your fridge, then this will probably work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Eisan

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to store my thinlit craft dies. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store my thinlit craft dies. The magnet is strong enough to hold them however the sheet itself is floppy which causes the dies to fall off as the sheet bends. I fixed this by adhering the magnetic sheets to stiff sheets of cardboard and now they work perfectly and I have all my dies stored in a ring binder in top loading plastic wallets.
customer_reviews.author: DivineAngel00

customer_reviews.title: Strong Hold Magnet Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weight and sturdiness of these magnet sheets. The quality is definitely good. I'm a scrapbooker and use them to store my metal dies. I place the magnet sheet into an 8.5 X 11 page protector or I cut it to fit into the pockets of a photo album sleeve (see pictures). The dies do not fall off when I pull the magnet sheet out or turn the page. I will definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: great quality! excellent value! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to use as backing for bumper stickers to place on my car. they are strong enough & thick enough to hold a bumper sticker on my car without them moving or being relocated by the elements (rain, wind, etc--haven't gone thru winter in minnesota yet). i would, however, take the bumper stickers off when i go thru a car wash as they're definitely not THAT secure. the sheets are easy to cut with good, sharp scissors. these are high quality magnetic sheets that i recommend for most arts & crafts projects.
customer_reviews.author: 2cairnterriers

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much easier to use than I expected. I used them to make magnets for my sons birthday party invitations, and they were such a hit. I used the leftover scraps to make decorations for our fridge. very great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Daryl-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Durable and magnet-y!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnetic sheets to make stickers I've collected into magnets for my fridge or car. The magnet itself is thick and the stickers I add on do not budge once they're stuck on. I have put a couple of the magnets I've made on my car and I haven't lost one yet! They've survived through nearly 7 months so far and have endured rain, snow, brushing snow off of my car, high winds and harsh sun. I take them off when I wash my car, but thats about it. Im very pleased and will be buying more for future sticker projects!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Using for 3D printing removable bed
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to make a diy magnetic removable print surface. I have printed with a heated bed a few times and they have not lost magnetism at all yet. The only down side is they do not activate inductive sensors. Eventually I will buy spring steel to try a flex plate but I'm currently using one magnetic sheet stuck to the printer bed and another with aluminum foil on the adhesive side and blue tape over that. Works good so far. Havent had to scrape a print off my bead since installed.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett A. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: but it must have been a different brand because the previous ones were much better. I wanted to lay items on these and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a package of these before, but it must have been a different brand because the previous ones were much better. I wanted to lay items on these and trace them out before cutting the magnet to fit. The paper covering the sticky side of the previous set worked very well for this, but this brand has a different type of paper covering which is doesn't accept ink very well....almost like wax paper.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Love it, looked everywhere for this
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looked everywhere for this! I put stickers on them and cut them out for my nieces and nephews, they love getting magnetic stickers they can slap on the fridge! Good magnets, too! I use a couple small pieces to hold Christmas cards on my fridge and they work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive, weak magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I ordered this because my new refrigerator was non-magnetic. This is not strong enough for fridge magnets. I bought an a separate box of small magnets in an attempt to strengthen the fridge magnets. It did not help. I returned these sheets to go another route. For a fridge the magnet would need to be 3 times stronger. The adhesive, however, is exceptionally strong. Removing it was laborious. If you are looking for something to remove this with (from a metal surface) use windex, a hard plastic scraper, and a lot of elbow grease. I tried to heat the adhesive with a blow dryer, olive oil, no use. Windex!
customer_reviews.author: BNP

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy no magnet strength
customer_reviews.text: He magnet pier won’t even hold a washer on it falls off. I already cut the product so I cannot return it
customer_reviews.author: Marleigh

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Crafting!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I bought this because I like making my own magnets. I saw a set of cute cat illustrations that I wanted to turn into magnets for my mother. She loved the magnets and they were so easy to make. Just stick the thing you want to make onto the sticky magnet and then cut to fit. That’s it! I’ll buy more of this when this packet runs out.
customer_reviews.author: MAST

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the other reviews here, I bought this to make magnets to stick on the car / mailbox with the cricut maker. I put the settings I used in the photo, (Magnetic Sheet – 0.5 mm, and more pressure). Before starting the cut I peeled the glue sticker off, and applied a vinyl sticker ( from sticky to sticky part, and then fed it into the cricut. It takes a little effort to separate the magnet as it doesn't cut through all the way, but it is really not bad at all. It magnetizes well to the car / mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great for making magnetic stickers.
customer_reviews.text: I used the magnetic sheets for my stickers because I wanted to make magnets. I am a huge marvel fan so this is a great idea to spice up your work/study station or room decor. Also I wouldn’t recommend using too much of the magnetic paper on super light devices because a little goes a long way. However, if you plan on using this for photos be my guest because it would help prevent it from wearing down the edges of the photo. Personally I prefer to use snippets of this sheet because I do not need to cover the whole sticker/photo to allow it to be a magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Turning Stickers into Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I had some stickers I didn't know what to do with, so I stuck them to these sheets and cut them out to make magnets for my refrigerator. It was super easy to cut to the right shapes and my new magnets have no moved an inch on my fridge. They probably couldn't hold much, one sheet of paper at most, but if you are just wanting them for decoration like me, then these are perfect for the job!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: These are great for storing Cutting Dies!
customer_reviews.text: I stuck these up inside a desk cupboard door for my craft cutting dies. It worked great. Easy to cut to fit to size and enough magnet to hold them in place. I took a picture but I do not see a place to add that (Amazon help?) anymore.
customer_reviews.author: recycle-it

customer_reviews.title: I am slightly disappointed by these
customer_reviews.text: I am slightly disappointed by these. I used them on the side of my daughters play kitchen set so she can use magnetic letters and other magnet car toys on it and the letters won't stay. the letters are small too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jarbeau

customer_reviews.title: Easy to shape, Hard to magnetize
customer_reviews.text: My best opinion: these magnets are ehh. I needed magnets to make bumper stickers/magnets and these horribly failed. The magnetic force is reallyyyy weak and didnt even stick to itself. Not saying they can’t be used for other purposes but NOT for bumper magnets. I tried it on the fridge and it sticks, but it is a weak stick. The magnet side is also like glossed, which makes it more slippery. They are easy to cut and craft though.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a magnet wall
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are great for their intended use, but I got them to make a magnet board on the side of my cupboard and had to return them. They would have stuck to the surface great, but they aren't strong enough to hold normal magnets. They would work for small light ones but not what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: shelly j

customer_reviews.title: Good product for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use the magnetic adhesive sheets to store my metal craft cutting dies. The magnetic sheets are strong enough to hold the dies in place and the adhesive is a plus as I am able to place the adhesive on cardstock easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedevil

customer_reviews.title: Use on large surface area for best experience
customer_reviews.text: It was ok, worked enough for my diy fridge tablet holder(white one) but there was more surface area which helped the weak magnet. My silver tablet stand had barely enough surface area for the magnet but sometimes it slips.If your trying to do something small that has the weight concentrated on a small area I would pass.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great use for storing your metal dies for papercrafting.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I use to attach my metal die to for storage purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to hold metal dies.
customer_reviews.text: This magnet is so thin and the adhesive is not strong. I tried putting a small die on it and it slides around easily. Very disappointed. The packaging should show the magnetic rating. It needs to be about 190 to be any good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnet works, adhesive doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: After cleaning off a flat surface I placed the adhesive side to the wall and applied pressure evenly for roughly 5 minutes. After letting it sit for a while I attempted to put up a metal sheet to hang on the magnet. It didn’t even last 3 minutes. I tried again with two sheets seeing if I could lessen the strain. It lasted 5 minutes. The adhesive side would fail, the magnet side would stay attached to the metal sheet, and the more attempts the worse the condition of the adhesive. Will attempt to get a refund so I’ll make another review regarding customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Alex harper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for arts and crafts!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to create magnets out of sticker that I had been gifted, and I am VERY pleased! The adhesive sheets are easy to use- just pull the white sheet off of the magnet and suddenly it is sticky! I have even used the stickers-turned-magnets on my car, and they have upheld in various weather conditions including rain and snow!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Castellano

customer_reviews.title: My dies are now organized!
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of dies for my card making and I was having trouble keeping them organized. I inserted one magnetic sheet in each page protector in a binder and put my dies on the magnet sheet. Now everything is organized and ready to use!
customer_reviews.author: M. Parke

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a project. Its nice to get a sheet vs a small square that you see sold in stores. I've had no issues with them! They hold well for homemade magnets for the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom so I could print from a full sheet of paper and adhere the magnet and then cut up the smaller pieces. It worked great. Magnet sticks to paper very well and the magnet is strong enough to stay up on my white board without sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough to be magnetic.
customer_reviews.text: These are very weak magnetically. Most everything I used on them slid right off. Wanted to use for a craft project to make hangable magnetic frames but these did not work. Ended up using thicker magnetic strip tape and got better hold.
customer_reviews.author: Fairylover78

customer_reviews.title: Using with a cricut machine
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is buying this to use with their cricut explore air 2 I used the .6mm setting and used the more pressure setting
customer_reviews.author: Amy Christensen

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work
customer_reviews.text: These magnet sheets are easy to work with. They have got adhesion and so far are working well for the interactive calendar I made for my kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa key

customer_reviews.title: Create your own magnets
customer_reviews.text: Great for making magnets with stickers and foam, easy to cut through. Made decor for cruise stateroom door. They did cause scratches on my stainless steel fridge though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with all aspects of these magnets. I am using them for my die storage
customer_reviews.author: Ivy O.

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for magnets
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use and it sticks to canvas but the magnetic side is not magnetic enough. I wanted to recreate a magnetic board where I can display all my travel magnets, but it can only hold the ones with really wide magnet backing. The circle magnets falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Jr

customer_reviews.title: Lots of quality crafting magnet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great value. I was surprised how strong the magnets are and how easy to work with they are. Perfect for making your own fridge magnets... I made party favors out of them!
customer_reviews.author: mustangirl17

customer_reviews.title: Makes Work Easier
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cube at work. I have some docs I need to hang up (constant reference material) and I didn’t want to tape or pin (new cube area). These work very well. Definitely worth the money and I started a trend.
customer_reviews.author: Starbuck85

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use these sheets to hold my die cuts on. I used the adhesive side to adhere to some card stock paper which is slightly larger than the magnetic sheet. It needed that extra support, other wise the sheet will fold, and my die-cuts came off. It is a wonderful way to keep organized. I slipped the sheets into a clear plastic accordion type folder. I dont stand it up, rather I have it in a draw laying down, when not in use. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: E C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my project
customer_reviews.text: These were a GREAT price. I used them to turn special stickers into magnets so that I didn't have to "use" them up! The magnetic sheets are already sticky, so I didn't even need my stickers to be sticky, but it worked fine. Looking forward to continuing to turn my sticker collection into magnets!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not strong at all, useless if cut smaller pieces
customer_reviews.text: do not buy if you need to cut smaller pieces and use them for any purpose, they are not very strong.. Might be useful for some art projects though.
customer_reviews.author: Naveed A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, you need a good printer. Great for gifts after printing your family picture
customer_reviews.author: Yael M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to make my wooden save the dates with the magnet on the back. They stuck well and where super easy to use and cut.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi palbicki

customer_reviews.title: Good photo solution
customer_reviews.text: I have been using random magnets to place photos on my refrigerator. The photo will curl and a gust of wind may blow them off. These magnetic sheets were the perfect solution. The photos are easily applied to the adhesive surface and then cut out with scissors. No more curled photos and they hold securely to the refrigerator surface.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: great product and excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: love these! super easy to cut to any shape and they stick well to all the things i’ve tried! used these on the back of my bumper stickers so i could remove them easily from my car without leaving the sticker residue and they worked like a charm! still securely on my car but easy to take off when i’m ready! definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: timothy r meadows

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Using these to store paper crafting dies. Strong magnetic bond.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic sheets were perfect for my craft die storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice hold
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic sheets do the job. Very satisfied. Use them for dye storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not very powerful.
customer_reviews.text: These magnet sheets are only strong enough to hold up something very light. The can't be affixed to a mini canvas or much of anything besides something as thin as the magnet sheets.
customer_reviews.author: rbrown

customer_reviews.title: Super-low magnetic force! Useless purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have to diminish these 5-stars rating. The magnet is too weak to be useful for anything I can think of. The only good thing about these sheets is that they do bond to the surface. However, If you use the stronger magnet, the adhesive will not hold the sheet in place. Conclusively, I cannot recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make picture magnets for friends and family for Christmas presents. Took less than 2 minutes per picture. Great results from this product! Will absolutely be purchasing again and recommending to friends!! FYI- Used scissors from tool box to cut just in case and they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Loughran

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic sheets are easy to cut into whatever size I need. I use them to hold my die cuts and they are not so strong that I can't get them off the magnet. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. Used them for bible class. Great quality and they stick well to the medium you are putting the magnet on.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: These are not even close to being magnetic. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Worthless POS. This is supposed to be magnetic? Not even close. I bought these sheets to cut to size to store dies for a clay extruder. Little, teeny, tiny dies that are approx 1/2” diameter. They don’t even sort of stick. They are completely worthless. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I have a home school room and I teach over the computer. This is great for creating magnetic surfaces. Just what do need.
customer_reviews.author: Mary V. Kammeyer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve got spirit
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness use these for the locker tags last year for cheer team totally going to buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Puchot

customer_reviews.title: Product not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: Thought the product would hold refrigerator magnets better. Doesn’t work the way I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur H. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Do not hold anything up of weight!!
customer_reviews.text: These do not hold anything! I bought these for my fridge to hold magnets and nothing sticks! The magnets are not even heavy they are flat and slide straight off. The adhesive is good which is why I gave it one star. They are now in the craft bin for the kids. Research and buy something a little more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca N.

customer_reviews.title: Not easily printable...paper too slick.
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. You cannot print on them, because there paper is too slick. We ended up cutting out letters from this. We made it work.
customer_reviews.author: FJHJ

customer_reviews.title: love these, use them for my preschool class to ...
customer_reviews.text: love these, use them for my preschool class to turn pictures from stories etc into magnets for our magnetic teacher easel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful product! We made photo magnets for party favors ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful product! We made photo magnets for party favors and they came out great! The adhesive is strong, so once a picture is placed it’s hard to move it, but overall it worked better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McConville

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Adhesive 8 x 10
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking. Stick great. I used them for my card dies to display on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Memories4evr

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these I use them for my metal dies. Hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes beautiful picture magnets for the refrigerator and metal bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with. Easy to cut. Attach pictures then cut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magnet
customer_reviews.text: I like that it stays where you put it. The half is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit too pricey for what I needed it for. Other then that it was really good quality if your wanting to pay the price I'd recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: I ended up throwing them out. Everythiij ng I tried putting just slides down. Very thin magnet.
customer_reviews.author: L Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It will not stick to fridge and are very week
customer_reviews.author: nike shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value fun to use to hang stuff on the refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying over and over nuff said, other than I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar F.

customer_reviews.title: Love to mount pretty cards on refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to temporary mount postcards and cards and pictures on my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K Winn

customer_reviews.title: Used with Stampin Up cutlets and Dies
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used these with Stampin Up cutlets. Helps keep them organized and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Anne

customer_reviews.title: Only good for fridge type magnets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping to use it to line a tool box to hold metal tools in place. The sheets aren't strong enough for this, they're really only good for making refrigerator style magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hipsher

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick sheets
customer_reviews.text: These have worked perfectly for whatever I've needed them for. I use them on my school bus to write my kids names for seating chart purposes
customer_reviews.author: Adam,J

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Fairly strong magnet. I used these to turn stickers into magnets and they stick to cars and the fridge just great. I even tested it out by throwing them at my fridge. These ones stuck and a different brand did not.
customer_reviews.author: corrina tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for die storage
customer_reviews.text: Work great to secure my dies so they are not lost. Holds even the small and extra large one. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great product and inexpensive too!!
customer_reviews.text: These are better quality than I thought they’d be and the price was very inexpensive!!
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in so many ways.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these magnets to make a sticker into a magnet for my car. It did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold B

customer_reviews.title: Sticks great - the sticky paper and magnetic side :)
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful paper! We use these to make magnets from stickers if we can't find a souvenir magnet we like when traveling. I also plan to use them for magnetic pictures for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Good adhesion, poor magnetic strength
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion for the product is really good. But the magnet is not very strong. This product does not do well with magnetic paint on wood. Works ok on my fridge but it would not pass the layered paper test for magnets.
customer_reviews.author: S. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and cut
customer_reviews.text: I am using them to store my dies and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Schlager

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these to keep my cutting dies in order, perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making sticker movable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make stickers into magnets. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Davids

customer_reviews.title: These work great. Very very sticky - be careful and make ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Very very sticky - be careful and make sure you are confident in your placement because once it's there, it's stuck. Strong magnet, works great for fridge magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless product. Never regretted buying anything else so much.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks on this. None of the magnet that we got from our travel is sticking on this. Only some extremely paper thin magnets are staying other than that nothing stays. Total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Shipra Goel

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make magnets with stickers I had. So far so good! Very durable! I have one stuck to my car and it has lasted through the weather so far!
customer_reviews.author: Krissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a daughter's art project. She made a doll and then had the magnets to add clothes to the doll. Worked fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to use, easy to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have to go to the store and hunt theme down because they were on here! Thank goddess.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Customizable and great price!! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: These adhesive magnet sheets are perfect for lining the inside of a DVD case and storing metal dies. I was able to cut them to the size I needed with my paper cutter. Customizable and great price!! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Marie O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: To stick on some alphabet letters and clock for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: the BEST thing invented for making funny magnets !!!
customer_reviews.text: So many uses; the BEST thing invented for making funny magnets for friends & family !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for what i need them for. Making a photo collage for my Fridge and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Myself and my makeup case tower thank you for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Myself and my makeup case tower thank you for this. My 12 yo daughter thanks me for the empties she's able to trade in for makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product- I ordered free 4x4 prints off of Shutterfly and used this adhesive magnet paper to make fridge magnet photos. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan D.

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat for crafts and other projects... made some custom fridge magnets!
customer_reviews.author: Leefrd

customer_reviews.title: work out great
customer_reviews.text: These was a real bargain, does the job that I needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pattsy Orsburn

customer_reviews.title: magnetic adhesive sheets
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for backing the balsa wood cutouts I was using to make refrigerator magnets. Keep in mind they are lightweight and not intended for use with very heavy items.
customer_reviews.author: Jacro

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I used them to store my dies. They work absolutely perfectly! The magnetic attraction works great! Strong adhesive on the back where I attached them to cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used to hold card making dies in place ..easy to organize easy to remove Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Woods

customer_reviews.title: Not cut exactly the same!
customer_reviews.text: If you want these to make a magnetic wall by placing them next to and on top of each other then be warned they are not cut exactly the same. Some are slightly wider than others so they don't line up nicely. Other than that they stick and work fine.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Good for extremely light objects
customer_reviews.text: Extreamly weak magnet. Purchase with the idea of using them as a hold still for my tool cart. Won't hold a 10mm socket from moving around a flat surface (standing upright).
customer_reviews.author: Teruo

customer_reviews.title: Storage solution for my Stampin'Up dies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me store my dies. Cutting them down a bit so I can put them in the stamp case will save me a lot of room. Will order again 😉.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A Owens

product_meta.title: Craftopia Magnetic Adhesive Sheets | 8" x 10" | Pack of 10 | Make Anything a Magnet! | Flexible Peel and Stick Self Adhesive for Crafts Photos Stamp Dies and More (8"x10" 10 Pack)
feature_bullets: AMAZING! 8" x 10" Magnetic Sticky Back Adhesive Sheets make it easier to use small pieces by cutting it up or create magnets out of images as large as 8 inches by 10 inches - With Ease

UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE! Easy to use! All you have to do is peel back the protective sheet and apply what you want. You can cut to any shape or size before or after application. Then stick it to any metal surface that's safe for magnets. It's as easy as that!
NO-NONSENSE! 10 sheet pack ensures you can create tons of projects with 10 sheets of material, each measuring 8x10 inches - In A Flash
FUNCTIONAL! 20 mil magnet helps you to be assured it's flexible enough for a variety of uses but strong enough to stick - FAST!
GETS THE JOB DONE! Strong adhesive lets you stick small pieces or large images or even textured materials to the strong adhesive surface just like the best crafters do
